nodes.text: Vasic was a Mustafarian male who worked as a junk dealer. As of 1 ABY he run his own shop, Vansic's Scrap & Trade Market, in the hidden Township of Aurilia on Dathomir.

Vansic appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
